entries.femaleVariant: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make her drink. Now, I've been trying to work with Iris Tanner for years, but the stubborn mare always brushes me off.
Kind requests, the promise of good pay – none of it helped. Always the same response – "I don't do biz with fixers."
But today she has changed her tune, heh. And why? She's been kidnapped by Wraiths.
Pettiness aside, if you help her, I bet she will finally toss me a bone... The gig details are attached – go fetch, V.
